abstract: Britain’s two largest banks painted a strikingly different picture of their businesses in the third quarter Tuesday when HSBC said earnings rose as loan provisions fell, while Barclays reported the opposite.
snippet: Britain’s two largest banks painted a strikingly different picture of their businesses in the third quarter Tuesday when HSBC said earnings rose as loan provisions fell, while Barclays reported the opposite.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s two largest banks painted a strikingly different picture of their businesses in the third quarter Tuesday when HSBC said earnings rose as loan provisions fell, and Barclays reported the opposite.

headline.main: HSBC and Barclays Earnings On Different Tracks
